Workflow.Name: [Operation Activity Risk Scores] Recalculate Risk Rating by batch
Workflow.Description: This flow performs a batch update on up to 5,000 records in the Operation Activity Risk Scores table where the ts_riskscoreribbontrigger is null. By stamping these records with the current date/time, it triggers the downstream [Operation Activity Risk Scores]Recalculate Risk Rating flow. That secondary process then aggregates data from the related Operation Activity (including Activity Type, Operation, Program Area, Site, and Stakeholder) to calculate and update the final risk scores.
